UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Characterization of novel human intragenic antimicrobial peptides, incorporation and release studies from ureasil-polyether hybrid matrix.
Literature.Reference: Mater Sci Eng C Mater Biol Appl. 2021;119:111581
Literature.Author: Mariano GH, de Sá LGG, da Silva EMC, Santos MA, Cardozo Fh JL, Lira BOV, Barbosa EA, Araujo AR, Leite JRSA, Ramada MHS, Bloch Jr C, Oliveira AL, Chaker JA, Brand GD

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13833(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=16µM),Cryptococcus neoformans B3501(MIC=4µM)
